SpellDef.Description: When struck in combat, loses 1 hitpoint, and gains +10 Dodge for 1 round
When struck in combat, loses 1 hitpoint, and gains +10 Dodge for 1 round

Target enemy is stricken blind, resulting in a 25% penalty to Accuracy and Dodge, unless they resist, for 2 rounds. Caster loses all bonuses from the Shield of Mirrors (-14 dodge, -5 defense) until next action. If it isn't resisted, the ability cannot be used on the same target for 5 rounds.
Caused by the Boots of a Forgotten Memory. Females who suffer this lose their next round.
Either reduces movement (-1), or dodge (-10) for 1 round.
Does 10 fire damage (+5 per death and fire shard) to target unit. If the unit is killed an inferno is left in their tile.
Does 10 fire damage (+5 per death and fire shard) to target unit. If the unit is killed an inferno is left in their tile.
Knocks victims back 2 tiles unless they resist.
Deals 48 piercing damage against a single target in your strategic domain. If resisted, no damage is dealt.
Caused by the Shield of Many fates. The effects vary greatly, both positive and negative.
A minor earthquake damages all enemies within 1 radius of the caster for 12 (+4 per earth shard) in damage.
For each time hit in combat, unit gains 1 stored energy from the Eartshakers boots
When struck in combat, loses 1 hitpoint, and gains +10 Dodge for 1 round
Heals user for 11+level hitpoints. Permanently reduces max hitpoints by 1, unless user is Immortal
Gives various things for wearer to use.
User knocked prone and adjacent hostile units lose their next round. Hostile units gain +60 Resistance to all damage except from fire attacks for 1 round
If unit is mounted or militia, has a 25% chance to lose a round whenever struck by someone carrying the Terrifying Riding Crop.
Does 10 fire damage (+5 per death and fire shard) to target unit. If the unit is killed an inferno is left in their tile.
The Blooddrinker weapon is preventing this unit from Regenerating any life in this tactical combat
The Blooddrinker weapon is preventing this unit from Regenerating any life in this tactical combat

TechDef.Description: Research in this area allows Kingdom players to construct the Theater improvement and Empire players to construct the Arena improvement. In dark times such as these, all people yearn for entertainment to help them escape the hardships and horrors of the day, even for the most fleeting of moments.

SpellDef.Description: Does 10 fire damage (+5 per death and fire shard) to target unit. If the unit is killed an inferno is left in their tile.

All enemy units suffer chance to lose next round equal to 5% per level, only affects humanoids. Demons suffer an extra 20%. Hexed targets are always affected, no matter level. This ability can be resisted.
When user is struck in combat, has a 20% chance to gain 1000 Dodge until end of its next round
Caster may for 20 mana summon a pack of wolves, a bear, a naja or a panther.
Summons a level 5 (+1 per earth shard) Earth Elemental.
All enemy units lose 10% of their current Hitpoints. Immortal users are immune to the damage.
Champion brings its dragon hatchling into adulthood, gaining a Dragon Mount.
Unit has been given the Hexed trait!
One adjacent enemy target suffers 18 Fire attack. If the target has multiple members, each additional member beyond the first adds +4 Fire attack. If user is Hexed, fire attack damage is halved.
Who knows?
Unit pays no mana to cast any spells for duration of combat
Unit loses 50 Accuracy and Spell Mastery when trying to attack anyone holding a Sword of Nightmares. Lasts 1 round
Each time struck by a Mindthief weapon reduces Spell Mastery and Spell Resist by -10% of own Spell Resist
Each time struck by a Mindthief weapon reduces Spell Mastery and Spell Resist by 3
Summons a level 5 (+1 per earth shard) Earth Elemental.

Any spell cast during the user's next action has its mana cost reduced by 50%. Does not stack with similar bonuses. Until the end of its next action, this unit has its Dodge and bonus to Dodge against Ranged attacks set to 0. One user per Combat.
Summons a level 5 (+1 per earth shard) Earth Elemental.
Something is making this unit count as Immortal
Summons a level 15 Seedling God.

If this unit is killed in battle they are resurrected with half their hit points. This resurrection removes this enchantment.
Target units in a 1 tile radius are enveloped in fire suffering a fire attack equal to caster's level times three.
